data.description: Mortgage Analytics InternFull-timeProperty: 43203-WG Ocoee Call CtrCareer Site Category: Mortgage & Financial Services Compensation: USD20 - USD20 - hourlyCompany DescriptionWestgate Resorts is the largest privately held timeshare company in the world, with 60+ resorts in top destinations like Orlando, Las Vegas, Gatlinburg, Park City, and Myrtle Beach. Recognized by U.S. News & World Report as one of the Best Companies to Work For, we’re committed to creating a supportive, rewarding workplace where our 9,000 Team Members can grow and thrive. Since 1982, we’ve delivered unforgettable vacations through exceptional service, innovation, and community engagement. With the recent addition of VI Resorts by Westgate, our footprint now includes the Pacific Northwest, Hawaii, Canada, and Mexico. Join us and be part of a team that values passion, integrity, and excellence, where your work helps create memories that last a lifetime.Job DescriptionHourly Rate: $20 per hourDuration: 5/1/2026 - 4/30/2027 (Start date can be flexible)***Must live within a commutable distance to the Ocoee/Orlando, FL areaWestgate Resorts has a one-year internship starting in Summer 2026 on the Mortgage Reporting & Analytics Team. This internship is designed for undergraduates in their senior year or students in a graduate program, leveraging their degree background such as Finance, Accounting, or Computer Science. Throughout the year, the intern will develop and utilize a blend of Excel, Tableau, and data development skills, to create reporting, analysis, and answer ad hoc questions. This internship will provide:Real world experience working in a corporate environment; developing an understanding of culture, social norms, interacting with and communicating with othersDirect exposure working on a specific team with other seasoned analysts and mentorship opportunitiesTechnical skill development utilizing tools such as Excel, Tableau and SQLSoft skill development such as written and oral communication, collaboration, and prioritization managementExposure to working with senior managementDeveloping a baseline understanding of Westgate’s business, systems, definitions, and industry termsAn opportunity to pursue full-time employment on the team or at WestgateThe Mortgage Reporting and Analytics team is responsible for (i) overseeing and supporting performance reporting and analysis for Westgate’s mortgage portfolio, (ii) providing working capital by pledging those loans to banks and investors, and (iii) provide strategic business support. The mortgage analytics internship will have an emphasis on Tableau development, and will be primarily focused on:Collections and support staff operations reportingFunding management support and reporting (how Westgate monetizes the loans it writes to owners)Mortgage portfolio performance reporting and analysis (e.g. how are loans performing based on FICO score?)Updating and enhancing our existing suite of Tableau reportsAd hoc operational support (e.g. how many loans were written for a particular sales center)Optimizing and organizing existing reporting where applicableNew Tableau reporting supporting other groups such as Digital Marketing, Social Media, LoyaltySpecial projects as assignedThe first three to six months will be focused on establishing a base level understanding of the team, the business, our data and reporting systems, and owning a portfolio of routine operational reports. This provides a learning foundation and path for success in the internship. Month’s six through twelve will build on your initial skills/experience to complete more complex ad hoc requests involving a higher degree of problem solving. The internship is designed to offer progressively more challenging requests as you become proficient in successfully accomplishing tasks. By the end of the internship, you will have:A foundational knowledge of the business of timeshare and Westgate with a primary focus on the mortgage portfolioHands on experience updating and delivering a portfolio of routine reportingExposure to our SQL based data warehouse; how it functions and serves as a cornerstone toolLearning data as a language and way of thinking; you will learn how to read and write SQLExperience using both Excel and Tableau to present information and create dashboardsUnderstand the strengths, weaknesses, and appropriate application of when to use Excel vs TableauExposure to the funding management processExperience in receiving abstract direction and translating into a concrete deliverableExperience in prioritization management, handling complex requests, and working through competing prioritiesQualificationsMust be an active undergrad in junior or senior year or currently in graduate schoolAnticipated or completed degree in Finance, FinTech, Engineering, or Computer ScienceMust live within a commutable distance to the Ocoee, FL areaCoursework and advanced experience utilizing Excel – the internship is designed to build on a pre-existing skillsetCoursework or experience using Tableau and working in a relational database environmentStrong critical thinking, problem solving, and high attention to detail skillsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsSelf-motivated and uses time effectivelyAdditional InformationWhy Westgate?Get access to your pay as you need it with our Daily Pay benefitWellness ProgramsFun, family cultureExclusive discounts for Team Member (i.e., hotels, resorts, restaurants, entertainment, etc.)Advancement & development opportunitiesCommunity Involvement Programs Westgate Resorts is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status or any other protected status under federal, state or local law.
